page.title: 12OCKBROOK & BORROWASH SPORT
page.content: Sport is popular in this area and is played to a very high standard by{Ockbrook Cricket Club}and {Borrowash Victoria Football Club.} There are several football teams for younger players but apart from tennis and badminton most other sporting activities take place outside the villages' area. { The Ockbrook and Borrowash Lawn {Tennis Club}was formed on {11th April} {1919}and played on its present site on Nottingham Road.The club has five hard courts and runs nine teams which is the{most in Derbyshire.}The club has a Barn Dance and a Dinner Dance every year, which is largely organised by the lady members who also organise jumble sales and other activities to provide useful additional income.The club is used for {Junior Prudential {Coaching.
